ivardefs.name: channel
ivardefs.desc: Details where to send notifications when resources are received that meet the criteria.

ivardefs.name: contact_
ivardefs.desc: Contact details for a human to contact about the subscription. The primary use of this for system administrator troubleshooting.

ivardefs.name: criteria
ivardefs.desc: The rules that the server should use to determine when to generate notifications for this subscription.

ivardefs.name: end
ivardefs.desc: The time for the server to turn the subscription off.

ivardefs.name: error
ivardefs.desc: A record of the last error that occurred when the server processed a notification.

ivardefs.name: reason
ivardefs.desc: A description of why this subscription is defined.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the subscription, which marks the server state for managing the subscription.

properties.desc: The subscription resource is used to define a push-based subscription from a server to another system. Once a subscription is registered with the server, the server checks every resource that is created or updated, and if the resource matches the given cr
